traits.name: Amphibious
entries: Oceanus can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Friend of the Sea
entries: Using gestures and sounds, Oceanus can communicate simple ideas with any beast that has an innate swimming speed.

actions.name: Trident
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2 damage) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) piercing damage.
